course_description: Examines interactions between economic developments (domestic and external) and political changes (domestic and external). Begins with general views and then examines particular issues (e.g., trade, monetary, development, environmental).
sections: Class Nbr: 3119, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 1-2:15p, Instructor: E. Reinhardt, Status: Open
